Description:
A TRUE STATEMENT IN STYLE
Contemporary in design and with no expense spared, this home provides the turn-key solution you have spent your weekends searching for.
Featuring the highest quality finishes and stunning Blackbutt flooring throughout, this beautifully presented home boasts 4 bedrooms, the master with spacious walk-in robe and complimented by an ensuite that looks as though it is straight out of a magazine with custom built vanity, floor to ceiling tiles, black tapware and double shower. The remaining bedrooms all have built-in robes and are serviced by the equally stunning family bathroom, complete with deep, free standing bath. The study provides an excellent place to work from home, or the flexibility of a 5th bedroom should you require the extra space.
The kitchen is at the heart of the home and features waterfall Cesar stone benchtops, 900mm freestanding oven with 5 burner stove, an abundance of soft close storage, dishwasher, black sink & hardware, whilst overlooking the spacious open plan lounge and dining that is flooded with natural light from the large windows. With the added charm of an open fireplace, the second living area ensures everyone in the family has their own space to relax.
Comfort all year round is ensured with ducted heating and cooling throughout.
Entertaining is made a breeze as the covered decked area leads straight off the main living room through bi-fold doors, catering for the indoor-outdoor lifestyle youve always desired.
The allotment of 1300m2 approx. boasts flat lawn areas for the kids and animals to play, while the double garage with workshop and double carport will keep the tools and cars safe.
Surrounded by natural bushland, native wildlife and walking trails leading through Wrights Forrest and into Emerald Lake Park, you will be able to immerse yourself in the hills lifestyle from the day you move in. Only minutes from both Emerald and Cockatoo townships, quality schools and public transport, this is a package that is going to be highly sought, so call today to secure your inspection!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 16 Bellbird Crescent, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Address: 2980 Gembrook Launching Place Road Gembrook VIC 3783
Description:
DESIGNED FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY ON 5372m2
Nestled on a completely useable block of 1.3 acres that features mature established shade trees is this spacious family home that has been custom designed and constructed with quality hardwood timbers and features ornate cornicing and large rooms providing a sense of space and comfort for the whole family. There are three living rooms including a step down living room, huge family meals area that adjoins the updated kitchen that comes complete with a 900mm stainless steel cooker, dishwasher, double inset sink and loads of cupboards and there is a separate rumpus/games room with its own access that offers the opportunity for multiple uses including media room, work from home space or teenagers pad. All four bedrooms have fitted robes and are large enough to accommodate queen sized beds at least. The master suite is serviced by an ensuite and also has a parents retreat that would also suit as a nursery. There is a separate study with built in cupboards, this room could also serve as a craft or hobby room. Tasteful décor, ducted heating and large windows offering views of the yard and on to distant paddocks add to the appeal of this beautiful home. The solar heated in-ground pool and spa is the perfect place for relaxed outdoor enjoyment and will be the centre of many happy occasions. Sealed road access, made in/out driveway, double garage plus side access to the rear yard and a separate colorbond garage completes an ideal family package that will cater to all of your needs.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
PRIVATE HILLS HIDEAWAY - MOTIVATED SELLER
High set to take in the leafy outlook in a quiet location, this classic blonde brick veneer has been built to last and offers the savvy first home buyer or investor adding to their portfolio excellent value for money being currently rented at $1478pcm. On just under half an acre of 'hills style' gardens this home offers 2 spacious bedrooms, updated kitchen and bathroom, light filled lounge, dining area, separate laundry and WC, a huge front deck and a single garage. All of this with easy access to Wrights forest walking tracks and Emerald Lake. This property represents excellent value for money. Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
A VIEW TO THRILL AND A HOME TO LOVE
Set to take advantage of the view across paddocks and beyond to the Warburton Ranges, this beautifully presented home will captivate you. Blending classic modern updates with character features, the charm and elegance throughout provides a welcoming atmosphere for the best in family living. There are two living areas, one that has a sliding door out to a decked area that is the ideal place to sit with a glass of the best and take in the view and enjoy watching Puffing Billy as he chugs along the track. The second living room offers a cosy place to settle back and watch television or read a book. The spacious, updated kitchen is fitted with loads of cupboards, timber benches, dishwasher and 900mm Savior Fare cooker and has a big meals area adjoining with spotted gum floating floors. Four bedrooms provide space for all with a fireplace in one room. The master suite is serviced by an ensuite complete with double shower. Both bathrooms have been fitted out with State of the Art designer style including a freestanding claw foot bath in the family bathroom. Ducted heating, two split systems and solar & gas hot water aid your enjoyment of the property. Accessed via a made driveway with side gate access and situated within walking distance of the Primary School, shops and renowned eateries, you will need to be quick to secure this wonderful property.
PLEASE NOTE THAT THERE IS ALSO AN ADJOINING 454M2 ALLOTMENT AVAILABLE THAT OFFERS ITS OWN STREET FRONTAGE AND HAS ALL SERVICES AVAILABLE
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Bush Land and Birdlife
Set on 1.6 acres (approx.) in the ever popular town of Gembrook, this classic 4 bedroom home is the perfect home for you and your family.
The home features 4 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and an awesome shed and workshop space. An open kitchen/dining area with a pantry and gas cook top and oven. Split-level with exposed beams and pitched ceiling to make the living spaces feel huge. Get cosy in the lounge room in front of the coonara fireplace surrounded by beautiful big windows looking out in to the gardens towards the creek that ambles along the edge of the property.
The home offers an incredible blank canvas to add your own personal touches or just move in and leave as is with great open plan living and brick veneer home. Split system heating and cooling providing comfort for you and your family all year round. Fruit trees and veggie garden surrounded by the natural bushland and birdlife, if youre lucky you might even see the resident echidna wandering across the back yard.
Located just on the edge of town on a quiet road letting you enjoy the sound of the birds in the trees! It is a short drive to the heart of town offering a number of restaurants, the iconic puffing billy railway station as well as the primary school, kinder and child care centre. This home is ideal for anyone looking to move in to a nice quiet neighbourhood surrounded by other families that have lived in the area for many years.
9.75m X 6m shed

Description:
The Great Escape!
Escape to a lifestyle that youll love! Situated on a no-through road, this beautifully presented home offers a private retreat yet is close enough to stroll into the main township of Emerald.
This 3 bedroom home is nestled privately behind landscaped gardens with a paved pathway meandering up to the full length Merbau verandah and entry. This home features a generous kitchen with 900mm cooktop and breakfast bench and overlooks the meals area where the whole family can gather and enjoy mealtimes together. A stunning feature wall of imported Greek stone heralds the entry into the spacious living area which has a cosy wood fire heater built into the stone wall and a wall of windows allowing natural light to flood in. The warm colours of the recycled Elm flooring contrasts beautifully with the modern colour hues in this main room.
The robed Master bedroom has an ensuite and the family bathroom has been tastefully renovated. The gas ducted heating system will provide your climate comfort in the cooler months. Step outside to enjoy the well-designed gardens surrounding the entertaining areas with built in bbq, the ideal place to relax and enjoy the company of friends and family. Follow another pathway up to a large workshop complete with a bar, bathroom and spacious office the perfect man cave, teenage retreat, artists studio or music room.
There are two driveways into this property one leading to a double carport with roller door and the other to a single carport adjacent to the home, perfect for trailer storage. This property is fully fenced and offers abundant storage and space, perfect for kids and pets to play safely.
Less than a kilometre to Emerald township, simply stroll to town to enjoy all the fine eateries, shops and access to public transport. The young, and young at heart will delight with the distant sounds of Puffing Billy traveling through Emerald. Dont delay, this beautiful home will be snapped up quickly!

Description:
Dual Occupancy on Three Acres
CLOSE DATE SALE BY August 16th Unless Sold Prior
All offers Considered Must be Sold
Set on 3.5 sprawling acres (approx.) in the leafy little town of Gembrook, this classic 4 bedroom home is the perfect new home for you and your family.
The home features upstairs 3 bedrooms plus a study, two rooms with built in robes and the master bedroom is huge with its own study nook and double doors opening out on to the balcony with a walk in robe and large ensuite, The spacious lounge with coonara wood fire heating, separate kitchen area, dining room and a second living room or kids retreat. The two main living areas offer double doors opening out on to the beautiful big deck that wraps around the back of the home overlooking the private back yard, perfectly edged with trees and shrubs so no neighbours can be seen
Down stairs offers another bedroom, a huge living area or rumpus room, wine cellar, and bathroom that has been plumbed in but awaiting a new owner to finish off. This huge space down stairs would be prefect to accommodate teenage children, your parents or even set up as a B&B
Other features the home offers is solar power, water tanks, a double garage under roof line with internal access and remote roller doors, a separate 2 car garage, circular drive way, a number of garden sheds, decking and veranda on every side of the home
Packed with potential, this home offers an incredible blank canvas to add your own personal touches or just move in and leave as is. The beautiful big three and a half acres is perfect for any number of pets maybe even a pony!!
Located just on the edge of town on a quiet road letting you enjoy the sounds of the birds in the trees and surrounding wildlife I am told there is even a resident echidna that stops by on occasion. The home is a short drive to the heart of town offering a number of restaurants, the iconic puffing billy railway station as well as the primary school, kinder and child care centre. This home is ideal for anyone looking to move in to a nice quiet neighbourhood surrounded by other families that have lived in the area for ever.
Please call to book your private inspection

Description:
"Misty Lakes" Private, Tranquil & Full Of Character
This character home oozes rustic charm and is situated on a large private block. Youll feel right at home as soon as you arrive at this well presented log home, embraced by stunning trees and flowering shrubs.
The spacious open plan living area features cathedral timber lined ceilings, polished floorboards, ceiling fan, windows with stain glass trims, a cosy wood fire heater, split system and gas ducted heating for your climate comfort. Included in this area is the meals area, an inviting nook surrounded by large windows providing beautiful garden views, the perfect place to relax with your favourite drink as you watch the native birdlife revel in the lush setting. The well-appointed kitchen will spoil the home chef with its abundant space, stone bench tops, large pantry and Bosch dishwasher.
Each window in this home offers a garden view and the clever floor plan provides zoned bedrooms for privacy. There are three bedrooms, the Master with a 3 spectacular walls of windows which invites natural light to cascade into the room while providing direct access out to the decked pool entertaining area north facing for glorious summer swims.
The leafy setting for this home is landscaped and includes flowering ornamentals and seasonal bulbs for colour enjoy the lush gardens and sounds of nature relaxing on the elevated rear verandah. There is a double carport, double garage, garden shed and terraced lawn area that could be easily converted to vegetable beds.
Enjoy a short and easy access to plentiful walking tracks that will take you through the Wright Forest or to the iconic Emerald Lake Park or Emerald Township where you can enjoy all the renowned eateries, recreation reserve, schools, preschools and shops. This well-loved home is ready for the next owners to move in and enjoy.
Bethany Day 0438 844 968 Aaron Day 0407 365 994
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Home Sweet Home In The Heart of Emerald!
Oozing character, charm and style, this 3-bedroom treasure trove is nestled in the leafy surrounds of Emerald where your comfort is assured.
A split level design, rich floorboards, large windows welcoming natural light, exposed brick walls, decorative bulkheads and modern pendant lighting, this abode is wrapped in premium quality and attention to detail throughout.
Step in to discover multiple spacious living areas, 2 bedrooms with double built-in robes, and the third bedroom with a built-in robe and private ensuite. The kitchen exudes a cottage-style feel with rustic tiles and a multi-coloured brick-style splashback.
Situated on a massive 3321m2 rectangular block of land, there's no shortage of space when it comes to entertaining friends and family. The sizeable pergola creates the perfect setting for wining and dining all year round.
Close to central Emerald shops and an easy commute to Melbourne, the location boasts a beautiful lifestyle and an absolute haven for nature lovers. Breathe in the crisp fresh air and delight in the sound of the Puffing Billy steam train whistle which echoes through the hills.
Simply a breathtaking and manageable lifestyle property, an inspection is a must. Contact Jeremy Phillips on 0490815541 today.
Additional Features:
3321m2 approx. Rectangular Block
3-Car Garage + Double Garage + Carport
Dishwasher
Ducted Heating
Fireplace in Living
Large Pergola

Description:
Lo-COMO-tion!
This house is doing a brand new dance, having been lovingly refurbished with luxurious wall to wall carpets, fresh paint throughout and modern window treatments in every room. Yet it retains scope to put your own touches on it.
Glimpse Puffing Billy passing by just behind the azaleas or dance to his chug-a-chugging in either of the two good sized bedrooms with BIRs or the large master which is served by a full ensuite.
The wrap-around views from the living area will make you happy, particularly when illuminated by a summer sunrise. But with an excellent ducted system a misty winter day is just as good.
A little bit of rhythm and a lot of soul has been poured into the kitchen with gorgeous stylish green glass splashbacks, and brand new stainless steel appliances. It has an open plan design overlooking the spacious dining room and original bar.
Replete with a new standalone studio/craft room crafted from glass and light which makes for an ideal space to take on any project; containing a convenient kitchenette and computing connections. There is also a man cave below with enough room to swing a cat, or indeed your hips.
So come on, come on, do the lo-COMO-tion with me at the open for inspection.

Description:
The Largest Low Density Residential Block & the Only North Facing Block in the Area for the Best Price - Don't Miss Out !
- The ONLY North facing block on the market in Emerald!
- Look at what is on the market in Emerald & what has recently sold & don't pay more for a 1/4 acre or 1/3 acre in Emerald when you can have over 3/4 of an acre for less!
- Just over 3/4 acre
- Over 31m road frontage - it is perfect to build on a slab or stumps & being LDRZ building will be a walk in the park (STCA)
- Flat & private location with a natural environment that attracts an abundance of bird life
- Dual access from Wombat Crescent - perfect to have a 2nd access to your ideal shed (STCA)
- Virtually sealed road access to the block - only 200m of dirt road

Description:
Start Building Your Dream (STCA)!
Glorious 37 gently sloping acres in Gembrook. With an east facing aspect this block is bathed in morning sun and provides breath taking views across rolling green hills right out to Bunyip State Park.
This property has mains water and the mains gas connection could easily be connected. Also on this block is a large spring fed dam and creek with a 3 phase powered water pump.
This is the perfect lifestyle property or small hobby farm where you could build the home of your dreams (STCA). Walking distance to the Gembrook Township, the iconic Puffing Billy Station and public transport, this block is perfectly situated to give you country lifestyle with convenience.
Currently on the property is an old cottage that could be refreshed to live in while you build your dream home (STCA).
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Health & Wellness Lifestyle ~ Tri-Level Country Mansion
Ticks boxes you never knew you had
There can be no doubt that a life well lived is a life that is connected to its place in the universe. Willunga Estate is firmly established in a highly desirable country location where you can feel safe & secure to indulge in the pleasures of connecting to nature. Watch the sun rise and the colours of the sunsets play along the distant mountain ranges, follow thunderstorms across expansive skies. Take a walk around the 10 acres, breathe in clean air and meet the local wildlife. Ride the horses or bikes. Eat the produce from your own garden. Enjoy the peace, quiet, space & privacy. Star gaze.
There is simply no excuse not to live your best life here. After an early morning dip in the indoor solar heated salt-chlorinated pool & work-out in the adjacent gym you'll be unstoppable.
As a retreat from the stresses of life the home itself offers flexible accommodation, a solidity and well-built luxury that many buyers seek but rarely find in rural locations. Situated in the Yarra Ranges with excellent access to the Yarra Valley & delightful Hills villages.
If you are a large family or seek living with extended family members I thoroughly recommend you check out the floor plan. You will see how you can be amply housed in the many living spaces and bedrooms. The master wing with magnificent views, large walk in robe & ensuite is buffered from the rest of the household by a formal lounge. Upstairs, the further 5 bedrooms - all generous in size - have use of the separate w/c, bathroom, shower room & hand wash room. If not for a family this would work well for multiple guests.
Balconies are the first step outside and then onward to a large flat lawn with 6 fully fenced paddocks, a spring-fed dam, a grassed ménage & more beyond. A second entertaining space allows the adults and the kids to hold rival parties. Abba versus Eminem!
I could go on and on but I think you need to come and experience Willunga yourself. Why? Because you deserve it.
The features include:
10 acres
6 large bedrooms
Master wing
3 split levels, lowest level for recreation gym/rumpus/pool
Solar heated indoor salt/chlorinated pool
Four living zones
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite benchtops
Spectacular views from every window
Huge laundry/mud room with drying cupboard
Gas ducted heating
NOBO heating
Evaporative cooling
2 split systems
Ducted vacuum
Study
Two large outdoor entertaining areas with approval to build massive entertaining deck
Rustic shack with the potential to turn into a studio/office/dual occ
6 fully fenced paddocks
Electric fencing
Grass arena/ménage
Four car lock up garage
Enough parking for 15 cars
Large shed with concrete floor
Spring fed dam
Solar panels
Generator overide
100,000 litre water tank

Description:
Emerald Lake Park Is Your Neighbour!
AUCTION 17th AUGUST 2.30pm
Available for the first time in 25 years on a quiet, pretty, no thru road, this well built brick home with solid foundations is just a short stroll to Emerald Lake Park, Emerald Secondary College, local sports venues and a 2 minute drive to town. Set on over half an acre, this is the perfect home for families wanting more than just a house.
The sealed circular driveway takes you to an unassuming entrance with a double carport, but behind the front door is enough space for a large family. A master bedroom with ensuite is separate to the other 3 bedrooms which share a family bathroom and separate toilet, all bedrooms include built in robes.
The kitchen is central to the living area, providing an abundance of cupboard space, stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances. With 3 living areas and 2 dining/meals areas, there is enough space for everyone, and a ducted vacuum adds convenience. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling keep the home comfortable.
Outside, a large undercover entertainment area overlooks the expansive, relatively flat garden. Feed the family with an abundance of fruit from trees including apricot, mandarin, lemon, orange, olive, walnut, fig and mulberry, plenty of space for growing veggies, serviced by 2 garden sheds. This is a haven for children to explore and parents to build the likes of a garage, workshop or shed, Dependent Persons Unit or home extension (STCA). 14 x 250W solar panels with 4000W inverter assist with the power bills.
A rare opportunity to live in one of the most enviable locations in Emerald on a large block with the versatility to make this home your own.
Please note:
All properties details are correct at the time of publishing, some properties may have been sold or have gone under offer. We recommend that you confirm the open for inspections are still being conducted, by contacting the Agency or the Agents listed on the advertisement.

Description:
A MODERN MASTERPIECE IN THE HEART OF GEMBROOK
The best in modern style combines with a wonderful country environment to provide a home that caters to the whole familys needs and will provide a lifestyle that is unsurpassed. Just eight years young, the home offers a spacious open plan living area that adjoins the State of the Art Caesarstone kitchen complete with stainless steel Blanco appliances including dishwasher and 900mm stove and loads of bench space, drawers and cupboards. Doors lead from this section out to the covered alfresco area creating the perfect blend of indoor/outdoor living space to maximise relaxed entertaining. The second living area is a dedicated theatre room that is fully set up with a projector, home theatre amplifier, digital set top box, speakers and big screen all ready for you to settle back and watch the latest release. There are four bedrooms, three with fitted robes and serviced by the family bathroom. The lavish master suite is set away from the other bedrooms allowing privacy for all and has a sliding door leading out to the rear where Sunday brunch can be enjoyed. The grand ensuite is the ultimate in luxury with an oversized shower, double vanities and spa bath; there are his and hers walk through fitted robes as well. Creature comforts include internal access from the oversized double remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum and alarm system. Set in the middle of town, you can walk to the Primary School, kindergarten, child care and a variety of renowned eateries as well as our iconic and much loved Puffing Billy. The lifestyle you crave is right here waiting for you.

Description:
Make a REAL Difference
A 2 acre (approx) Ecological Sanctuary Nestled in a Hidden Valley
Glen Luce or Valley of Light is a conservationists dream, tucked away at the end of a cul-de-sac. Only minutes from the main township, as you enter the gated property you are transported into a magical wonderland.
In a time of existential climate crisis this is your opportunity to take part in the healing of the planet.
A passion project of the current owners who have re-vegetated a significant portion of the property with Indigenous and Gondwanan species.
As you journey through the property you will be touched by the love and patience bestowed on this parcel of land that is linked to the Menzies Creek nature corridor. Complete with walkways, footbridges and information plaques telling the stories of the native flora and fauna - this is like a jurassic theme park (minus the dinosaurs). Ferns are dotted along the two streams that run through the property, and a hidden bamboo forest accessible over one of the many footbridges is a childrens playground paradise. A resident bower bird has adorned his nest with lots of blue trinkets, and you can view him doing his bower dance in the shade of the gazebo. A nature-enthusiasts dream-land, with tree branches teeming with crimson rosellas, honey-eaters, kookaburras and king parrots as well as a regularly sighted echidna, wombats and yabbies.
The environmentally designed, one owner mud brick home sits nestled towards the rear of the property with a true north orientation. The home itself spans three levels, with a particularly adaptable floor plan. On the upper two levels you will find the north facing open-plan living area, with French doors opening onto a light soaked patio, perfect for entertaining all of your family and friends. As you make your way inside, you come to the recycled timber kitchen and walk-in pantry, with plenty of space to make good use of all of the yummy goodies grown on the property. A mud room/laundry room and bathroom complete this level. Continue upstairs where views from each room leave you feeling as if you are floating amongst the ferns. You will find two good sized bedrooms, one with built in robes and the other with an ornate antique wardrobe. There is a third bedroom or study, and ample storage space.
The versatility of this home lies in the lowest level, which was previously used as a therapists clinic and comes equipped with another two rooms, kitchenette, storage space under the stairs and in the hallway, as well as direct access onto a beautiful deck overlooking the spectacular grounds. The beauty of this floor plan means B & B potential, a separate living space for relatives, a home business or simply a large, single family home.
This home would suit someone with an appreciation for rustic charm and natural materials, where the outside is invited into every room. Here, mother nature meets environmental design, with high ceilings, louvre and highlight windows that can be opened to let heat out and assist with cooling in the hot Australian summers. You dont need to go without creature comforts however, with a wood heater, gas heating, ceiling fans, 14 solar panels and an instantaneous gas hot water system ensuring year-round comfort.
Complete with veggie patch, a plethora of producing fruit trees, a giant chestnut tree shading the 4-6 car carpark, and two 25,000 litre water tanks you will have an abundance of fresh produce year-round. Also boasting an additional 2 car carport, an underground cellar for storing all of your preserved fruits and veggies (or all of your alcohol) and a third 20,000 litre water tank to house excess winter water.
To truly capture the essence of this property, you need to take the time to wander the grounds. This property is far more than a house on a parcel of land it is an experience. Make sure you give yourself ample time, because you wont want to leave.

Description:
BLUEBELL COTTAGE 1973 m2 IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Tucked away in a no through road and just a short walk to the shopping centre is this much loved home that is privately situated on almost ½ an acre. The open plan living area has a gas log fire, split system and gas heater and adjoins an updated kitchen that features five burner gas hotplates, wall oven, loads of bench space and plenty of drawers for easy access. Every window offers a garden view and the clever floorplan provides zoned bedrooms for privacy. There are four bedrooms, the master is serviced by a walk in robe and full ensuite including spa bath and separate toilet whilst the remaining rooms all have built in robes. The tiled sunroom is the perfect place for large family gatherings or the ideal room to sit back with your favourite drink, whatever the weather, and observe the colourful array of birds that revel in the lush setting which includes a soothing water feature or you can delight in our iconic Puffing Billy as he chugs along the nearby ridge. The leafy setting includes a variety of colourful shrubs, flowering ornamentals and an abundance of fruit trees that will allow you to pursue a self-sufficient lifestyle. There is a double garage with a remote door, two garden sheds and plenty of off street parking including space for a truck, boat and caravan. All of this is within easy reach of the tennis club, recreation reserve, renowned eateries, schools, kindergarten and at the end of the road is a walkway that leads to Emerald Lake Park where water sports, walking trails and picnic grounds provide for outdoor fun. The owners of this wonderful property are now ready to pass the home on for the next family to enjoy many happy years just the way that they have.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Country Lifestyle on 1/2 an Acre
Set in a beautiful and private location in the highly desired township of Emerald is this much loved home that offers something for everyone. Privately positioned on a stunning, flat 1/2 acre allotment this well-presented family home features open plan lounge and dining that is overlooked by the light and bright kitchen, complete with timber benchtops and quality stainless steel appliances for all of your entertaining needs. Also featuring a second living area/playroom for the kids, office/ storage room, 3 spacious bedrooms, family bathroom & master bedroom that boasts a full ensuite. Special features includes polished timber floors, wood heater, split system heating and cooling, natural gas ducted heating and a fresh modern colour scheme throughout.
Outside offers a paved semi undercover area that is a great place for entertaining family and friends whilst overlooking the large lawns with veggie garden, fruit trees, chicken pen, wood shed and powered garden shed. All of this privately set back from the road for your own peace and quiet and within walking distance to the local Emerald shops, Puffing Billy Station, public transport and the local schools.
Call today, inspection is a must!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
A Lovely Life at Tudor Leigh
Bluestone gates welcome you into the world of Tudor Leigh. Set on 3 and a half easy-care acres, it provides all you could require to lead a truly lovely life.
The 2 storey Tudor house set in the middle of the block delights with a picture-perfect outlook from every window. Spend your mornings in the large country kitchen bathed in sunshine. The heart of this home supplies all the space you need for the most ambitious cooking project with 6 gas rings, extra-large oven, and double pantry. The slate flooring flows from the kitchen into the informal living area with wood-fired heater to snuggle around.
From there you step out into a large covered outdoor entertaining area where you can host parties with ease. The outdoor kitchen has a BBQ, stove, and the fixings for a beer tap so you and your guests can sit in comfort as you soak up the sounds of the bushland.
The garden is well established, full of camellias and maples alongside the native eucalypts. It offers large scope to improve your green finger with a poly-tunnel waiting for you to begin your own food forest. A fully fenced paddock with loose box is ready for a pony or alpaca if the fancy takes you. With sheds aplenty and three gated access points, space is never an issue at Tudor Leigh.
Enjoy your nights in front of the gas log fire in the elegant formal living area whose exposed brickwork is lifted with white paint to lend a French provincial air, and beautiful formal dining for special evenings. Two single bedrooms, currently used as his and hers studies, a large laundry and w/c complete the downstairs.
Ascend the stairs from the entrance hall to the upper floor landing and the spacious master suite with a WIR and FES. Relax in the claw footed bath of the main bathroom. 3 further double bedrooms with BIR will provide comfort for your slumber.
This private property is perfectly positioned in proximity to the centre of Emerald, so make it a priority to explore!

Description:
Ripe for Renovation
AUCTION 17th August 12.30pm
On a quiet road within walking distance of the Belgrave-Gembrook bus and just 2km to Emerald Secondary College, is this straightforward Hills-style Western Red Cedar home.
Sure, there is work to be done. But it is entirely liveable, and with good bones and plenty of scope, you can make this home your own.
This open plan, split level 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home is ripe for renovating. From the entrance, you have a view of the whole interior. The meals area is easily serviced by the adjacent kitchen, continue through the home to the family bathroom, 2 bedrooms and laundry. Downstairs there is a living area and master bedroom with ensuite. Heating options include a Coonara, electric, panel and gas wall heaters. The living area opens onto a large deck with a decommissioned spa.
Positioned on a gently sloping block of 1,163sqm, there is plenty of space to develop the garden. A 5.4m x 7.2m workshop is ready and awaiting some TLC to store your toys, tools or cars.
Fix and flip or live in and renovate as you go. Properties in the fours are in demand - get on it and snap up your next project!
Please Note:
All property details are correct at the time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold or have gone under offer. We recommend that you confirm the open for inspections are still being conducted by contacting the Agency or the Agents listed on the advertisement.
